00029 #include "brisassdpclient.h"
00030 
00031 using namespace BrisaUpnp;
00032 
00033 BrisaSSDPClient::BrisaSSDPClient(QObject *parent) :
00034         QObject(parent),
00035     running(false)
00036 {
00037     this->udpListener = new BrisaUdpListener("239.255.255.250", 1900,
00038                                              "BrisaSSDPClient", parent);
00039     connect(this->udpListener, SIGNAL(readyRead()), this, SLOT(datagramReceived()));
00040 }
00041 
00042 BrisaSSDPClient::~BrisaSSDPClient() {
00043     if (isRunning())
00044         stop();
00045 
00046     delete udpListener;
00047 }
00048 
00049 void BrisaSSDPClient::start() {
00050     if (!isRunning()) {
00051         udpListener->start();
00052         running = true;
00053     } else {
00054         qDebug() << "Brisa SSDP Client: Already running!";
00055     }
00056 }
00057 
00058 void BrisaSSDPClient::stop() {
00059     if (isRunning()) {
00060         this->udpListener->disconnectFromHost();;
00061         running = false;
00062     } else {
00063         qDebug() << "Brisa SSDP Client: Already stopped!";
00064     }
00065 }
00066 
00067 bool BrisaSSDPClient::isRunning() const {
00068     return running;
00069 }
00070 
00071 void BrisaSSDPClient::datagramReceived() {
00072     while (this->udpListener->hasPendingDatagrams()) {
00073         QByteArray *datagram = new QByteArray();
00074 
00075         datagram->resize(udpListener->pendingDatagramSize());
00076         udpListener->readDatagram(datagram->data(), datagram->size());
00077 
00078         QString Temp(datagram->data());
00079         QHttpRequestHeader *parser = new QHttpRequestHeader(Temp);
00080 
00081         notifyReceived(parser);
00082 
00083         delete datagram;
00084         delete parser;
00085     }
00086 
00087 }
00088 
00089 void BrisaSSDPClient::notifyReceived(QHttpRequestHeader *datagram) {
00090     if (!datagram->hasKey("nts"))
00091         return;
00092 
00093     if (datagram->value("nts") == "ssdp:alive") {
00094         emit newDeviceEvent(datagram->value("usn"),
00095                             datagram->value("location"), datagram->value("nt"),
00096                             datagram->value("ext"), datagram->value("server"),
00097                             datagram->value("cacheControl"));
00098         qDebug() << "Brisa SSDP Client: Received alive from " <<
00099                 datagram->value("usn") << "";
00100 
00101     } else if (datagram->value("nts") == "ssdp:byebye") {
00102         emit removedDeviceEvent(datagram->value("usn"));
00103         qDebug() << "Brisa SSDP Client: Received byebye from " <<
00104                 datagram->value("usn") << "";
00105 
00106     } else {
00107         qDebug() << "Brisa SSDP Client: Received unknown subtype: " <<
00108                 datagram->value("nts") << "";
00109     }
00110 }
